properties.title: Matrix to Cell Ranger matrix module
properties.author: Laurent Jourdren

section.name: Matrix to Cell Ranger matrix module
section.p: This module allow to create a Cell Ranger matrix (version 1 or 2) from expression or matrix data.

ul.li:
Input port:
additionalannotation: Additionnal annotation data (format: additional_annotation_tsv) from the design file. This data allow to describe the genes/features of the Bioconductor SingleCellExperiment object
matrix: Matrix data (format: expression_matrix_tsv) if matrix input is enabled
expression: Expression step output (format: expression_results_tsv) if matrix input is not enabled
Output port: A Cell Ranger matrix.

tr.td: The input of the module is a matrix (e.g. 10X Genomics data). For SmartSeq2, this parameter is usually set to false.
When this parameter is enabled, feature annotations will be used for the second column of the feature/gene file of the Cell Ranger matrix output.
The name of the field in the additional annotation to use for the second column of the feature/gene file of the Cell Ranger matrix output.
Value of the third column of the feature file of the Cell Ranger matrix output (Cell Ranger matrix format version 2 only).
Version of the Cell Ranger format output to use. Currently only version 1 (Cell Ranger version 1 and 2) and 2 (Cell Ranger version 3) are supported.

ul.pre: <!-- Matrix to Cell Ranger matrix step --> <step id="mymatrix2cellrangermatrix" skip="false" discardoutput="false"> <module>matrix2cellrangermatrix</module> <parameters> <parameter> <name>input.matrices</name> <value>true</value> </parameter> <parameter> <name>use.additionnal.annotation</name> <value>true</value> </parameter> <parameter> <name>additionnal.annotation.field.name</name> <value>Gene name</value> </parameter> <parameter> <name>additionnal.annotation.type</name> <value>Gene Expression</value> </parameter> <parameter> <name>cell.ranger.matrix.format</name> <value>2</value> </parameter> </parameters> </step>
